class.name: MeshTexture
class.brief_description: Simple texture that uses a mesh to draw itself.
class.description: Simple texture that uses a mesh to draw itself. It's limited because flags can't be changed and region drawing is not supported.

members.member: Sets the base texture that the Mesh will use to draw.
Sets the size of the image, needed for reference.
Sets the mesh used to draw. It must be a mesh using 2D vertices.
